Bruce Guerin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Guerin 0 Bruce Guerin (January 18, 1919 – June 27, 2012) was an American child actor known for his roles in silent films during the 1920s. Bruce_Guerin ( January_18_,_1919 – June_27_,_2012 ) was an_American_child_actor known for his_roles in silent_films during the_1920s .
